This is a testharness.js-based test.
[FAIL] sendKeyFrameRequest resolves for video receiver, and throws for video sender
  promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "ReferenceError: RTCRtpScriptTransform is not defined"
[FAIL] sendKeyFrameRequest throws for audio sender/receiver
  promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "ReferenceError: RTCRtpScriptTransform is not defined"
[FAIL] sendKeyFrameRequest throws for unused transforms
  promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "ReferenceError: RTCRtpScriptTransform is not defined"
[FAIL] sendKeyFrameRequest throws for unset transforms
  promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "ReferenceError: RTCRtpScriptTransform is not defined"
[FAIL] sendKeyFrameRequest rejects when the receiver is negotiated inactive, and resumes succeeding when negotiated back to active
  promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "ReferenceError: RTCRtpScriptTransform is not defined"
[FAIL] sendKeyFrameRequest rejects when the receiver is stopped
  promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "ReferenceError: RTCRtpScriptTransform is not defined"
Harness: the test ran to completion.
